Menchov wins a three-up sprint to the finish

photo: AFP

The Russian is now a new race favorite, but after sharing out the victory spoils he admitted it is early days yet.

‚ÄúOn the final climb I just happened to find myself with two teammates, and they did a lot of work which was a huge help to me in the end,‚Äù said the Russian, who moved up to third place overall behind Cyril Dessel after the Frenchman lost the yellow jersey to Landis by only eight seconds. ‚ÄúIt wasn‚Äôt easy.
